game

Class HouseShopping

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.HouseShopping

  • public class HouseShopping
extends java.lang.Object
    Withholds all the methods needed when a user wants to buy or sell houses or hotel.
    Author:
    Bjarke

    • Method Detail

      • buyHouse

        public void buyHouse(User user,
                     Board board)
        This method is called from the controller when a user wants to buy a house or hotel. It allows the player to pick what colour of field he wants to build houses or hotel on. Calls a method which uses the users option as a variable.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.
        board - The gameboard as a whole.

      • sellHouse

        public void sellHouse(User user,
                      Board board)
        This is method called from the controller when a user wants to sell a house or hotel. Checks if the user got any houses or hotel on his owned fields, if so allows him to sell one of those.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.
        board -
